font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 任命： to set or establish in a rank or office
【例】 The new Secretary of the Treasury was instated on Monday. 新的财政部长于星期一被任命
【近】 designate, appoint, inaugurate, induct, install, nominate
【反】 dismiss, oust 罢免
【记】 in state 处于某状态
